## Chess.isAttacking() method

Checks if a square is attacking a target square.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isAttacking(square: Square, targetSquare: Square): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  square | [Square](./chess.ts.square.md) | Attacking square |
|  targetSquare | [Square](./chess.ts.square.md) | Target square |

**Returns:**

boolean
